body.p: Unicode enables you to display, and work with, documents in that have different character sets, such as German and Japanese, or different code pages.

provides the following markup tables to import Unicode documents:
EQFUTF8 for files which are encoded in UTF-8 format
UNICODE for files which are encoded in UTF-16 format
To use Unicode you must import the documents using the UNICODE or the EQFUTF8 markup table.
